pinyin: shen2 bu4 zhi1 gui3 bu4 jue2

definition: ghost/demon/terrible/damnable/clever/sly/crafty/(suffix for sb with a certain vice or addiction etc)/one of the 28 constellations

sentences.english: The thief slipped out of the room without anybody noticing.
sentences.chinese: 这个贼神不知鬼不觉地从房间里溜了出来。

sentences.english: He had insidiously wormed his way into her affections.
sentences.chinese: 他已经神不知鬼不觉的逐渐赢得了她的爱情。

sentences.english: They had mysteriously found their way there from the wine cellar!
sentences.chinese: 这些酒瓶神不知鬼不觉地从酒窖离开了这里。

sentences.english: Perhaps I can sneak out of the classroom unnoticed.
sentences.chinese: 也许我可以神不知鬼不觉地溜进教室。

sentences.english: They had mysteriously found their way there from the wine-cellar!
sentences.chinese: 这些酒瓶神不知鬼不觉地从酒窖来到了这里。

sentences.english: They had mysteriously found their way there from the wine cellar.
sentences.chinese: 它们神不知鬼不觉地从酒窖来到了这里。

sentences.english: Without anyone noticing , John slipped out of the classroom.
sentences.chinese: 约翰神不知鬼不觉地溜出了教室。

pinyin: ren2 bu4 zhi1 gui3 bu4 jue2

definition: as easy as blowing off dust/effortless/with ease
pinyin: bu4 fei4 chui1 hui1 zhi1 li4

definition: to cross the sea by a trick (idiom)/to achieve one's aim by underhanded means
overt/to make no secret (of one's presence)/grandiose/with great scope
(of a person) honorable/not devious/(of a behavior) fair and aboveboard/without tricks/openly/(of a situation) out in the open
to coordinate outside and inside offensives (idiom)/(fig.) to act together
to fool people (idiom)/to pull the wool over people's eyes
